definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cut or gather wood, usu. firewood (NH id.; Ar. h.at.abun firewood, h.at.aba collect firewood (v. Wetzst in De:Ps 144:12); Eth. h.at.aba: cut (or gather) firewood)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[יַחְטְבוּ]] Ez Eze 39:10; Inf. [[לַחְטׂב]] De 19:5; Pt. [[חׂטֵב]] De 29:10; pl. [[חׂטְבִים]] 2Ch 2:9; cstr. [[חׂטְבֵי]] Jos 9:21 + 3 t.; pass. pl. f. [[חֲטֻבוֹת]] Pr 7:16—cut or gather wood, sq. acc. De 19:5, De 29:10 (‖[[שׁאב מים]]); cf. Ez Eze 39:10 [[מן־היערים]] (obj. in preceding cl.); 2Ch 2:9 (‖[[כּׂרְתֵי הָעֵחִים]]); Pt. cstr. [[עחים]] ´[[ח]] Je 46:22, and (‖[[שׁׂאֲבֵי מַיִם]]) Jos 9:21, Jos 9:23, Jos 9:27.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מְחֻטָּבוֹת]] Ps 144:12 meaning dub.; perhaps hewn (so, in substance, Thes MV SS Ew Che Bae; v. however II. [[חטב]]), of corner-pillars ([[זׇוִיּוֹת]] v. [[זׇוִית]] p. 265 supr.), sim. of beautiful, stately daughters.
